评论详情: Keep your feet warm!
Arrived fast. Great shoes

评论概述: It's fine shoes around house or outdoors.
评论详情: It's a fine shoes but not walking with pebbles/stones underneath.  It's a struggle to get over your heels like most winter shoes/boots.
Got these for my son for Christmas gift. He loves them.
love these boots, nice and warm, definitely water resistant, not sure i'd go walking through deep puddles in them to test the waterproof part
I had to return because the arch isn't in the right place & they pinch my feet. The length is perfect but the fit is way off. I wouldn't recommend this product.

评论概述: Excellent shoe with very squeaky sole
评论详情: I love these shoes. You need to be careful walking around with damp feet on hard floors, though. Deafening squeaks from the soles happen easily and unintentionally. I wish they were a little quieter and then I would give them five stars.

I've had Whitin barefoot sneekers for a couple years. Very comfy, but not so good in the winter. These insulated high tops are nice for winter. Which we are now in the middle of. I was out shoveling snow for 'bout an hour. working in slush maybe an inch in places at the end of the drive way removing the snowplow berm before the big chunks freeze hard as a rock. No wet socks. Regular socks, not wool. Feet stayed warm. ~36F. Also cleared the deck and path to my office. The wide toe box is a huge plus. Light weight. Con: laces. Bit of a struggle to get them on. All my shoes are slip on. Thinking elastic laces.
These shoes are so comfortable,  I've had them on all day and so comfy..  I like the quality of shoe so far.. Other people like them when they seen them on my feet..

We wear various zero-drop shoes (Xero, Altra, Bedrock, etc.), and I ordered several pairs of different styles of Whitin's (including these) based on the great reviews. However, they arrived smelling heavily of noxious chemicals (much more than is typical with other shoe brands we've purchased). I returned them as that was concerning to me, not knowing what chemicals we'd be in contact with or breathing. I since searched reviews and found a few that mentioned this; strange that not more have. Posting in case this helps anyone. Too bad because we would have liked these otherwise.
They came laced up already, a +. Very comfortable and easy to put on. Keep my feet warm with good socks as well. Now to test the durability. Not sure they are snow approved.
Complete junk of a shoe trust me!

评论概述: Not what I had originally thought they would be.
评论详情: While they are servicable, they are much lighter than I thought they might be to help hold out the cold. There is absolutely no arch of any sort and the inner sole pulls out so easily it is hard to keep them in when removing the shoes.

These are warm enough as long as you keep them dry. They're fine walking through a little slush or rain, but if you're spending any length of time in wet conditions your feet will get wet and then cold. Dry and snow traction are solid, wet traction is terrible. I did have an issue with the food beds sliding back, but a little double sided tape fixed that and over all I'm happy with these for the $40 I paid.

My husband kept making fun of my daughters and me when we all made the switch to barefoot shoes because that’s all we ever talked about. I bought him a pair of these without telling him they were barefoot and noticed that he started reaching for these more often than any of his other shoes. When I asked him why he always wore these shoes, he replied that it was because they were his comfiest shoes. Imagine his surprise when I told him that he was now a fan of barefoot shoes! Honestly, I have several pairs of these myself, and they are very comfortable, yet very inexpensive for barefoot shoes, making them perfect for the person who wants to try some barefoot shoes without spending a fortune - whether they know they’re doing so or not! 😁

They feel like a cloud on my feet. The whole shoe including the soles are lined. Nonetheless, you can still feel the ground beneath your feet while they stay warm. I was concerned when I saw the upper portion is fabric, but it does great at keeping out the wind and cold. Most importantly, they are so, so comfortable. Just heavenly on the feet. Such a great value!

评论概述: Warm, comfy, feel good to walk in.
评论详情: This is my third pair of barefoot category shoes, and my second serious pair, and for the price, I have to say it's absolutely worth it. The toe box is perfectly wide to match the curvature of my feet - about half a centimeter of wiggle room on by big toe, and half a centimeter on the pinky, with both feet, that's perfect. I know the barefoot style of shoe isn't for everyone, but these fall into that category, though they're a little more padded than typical - gotta keep the feet warm, and I think they hit a good balance. I've been out in the snow with these and they're thin enough to have halfway decent ground feel while also almost completely isolating me from the otherwise imminent frostbite. I've seen other reviews mention removing the insole for more feel at the expense of insulation, maybe I'll do that closer to summer. The false fur they're lined in is very plush, I can feel the texture and plush of it even through socks and I find it very comfortable, at least until my feet start sweating while I'm indoors. I haven't slipped in them by accident, they're not as unforgiveably grippy as my pair of Merrell Vapor Glove 6es, but they do have some good grab on all the surfaces I've walked on so far. I'm no fashion nut or anything, but I don't think they look bad, about like a stereotypical cold weather high top shoe would look, just odd with how wide the toe is. It's up for anyone else buying these to decide whether they like them or not, but I have no strong opinions myself other than that I don't mind the look. I can't speak on behalf of the durability yet, I haven't had them for terribly long to be able to tell, but they haven't fallen apart yet after two days so I guess that's a good sign.

These are the most comfortable shoes I have ever worn.  I bought a pair of low tops too.  I can't go back to normal pointy shoes.  Pointy is evil.  Not only are these comfortable. They will help prevent the accidental ankle roll.
Super comfortable

评论概述: Perfect at first, but then some flaws...
评论详情: This felt like the perfect shoe at first and i was very excited to wear it. Unfortunately the seam on the top part of the shoes jams into my toes when I step. otherwise I love this shoe. I wish I could keep it.

评论用户: good but does not allow enough hints
评论详情: The shoe fit well, has a nice soft lining which keeps your feet warm. Very functional shoe.

You wanted a cheap semi durable wide toe box show for the winter and this is it, so long as you so not mind the annoying crinkling plastic sound it makes with every step you should get this show  I ordered half a size up afraid the faux lining would take up room inside and it doesn’t feel like that was needed, i’m not slipping around in there either so it’s fine

评论概述: Great winter shoe for women as well!
评论详情: I'm obsessed with this Barefoot brand! Whitin is a brand I trust along with Altra. I only wish that these shoes were marketed as being unisex because I was looking for a good boot that would keep my feet warm but I was searching for women's shoes and I had to do a return on a brand that just wasn't as good before I found these. Just popping in to say that these shoes are perfectly well suited for women as well!

These are just a bit smaller than other Whitin shoes that I have.  However, with just normal socks, they are very comfortable and warm.  I live in Gig Harbor, WA and as winter is setting in, the temperatures are in the 40's during the day and 30's at night.  These shoes provide minimalist comfort while keeping my toes warm.  The upper is also made with a water resistant material to keep feet dry in dewy grass.
Size definitely fits small. Order up! They are very comfortable and warm though
If you got flat feet get'em!
These shoes are very comfortable, very Roomie toe compartment , Finally, I found a pair of shoes my feet like.

These are comfortable and one docked star because they run small. My hubby says they are a little shorter than his other barefoot similarly sized shoes, so order up. Hubby says with insole, thick socks are a no-go. He's going to wear them without the insoles, break them in and see what happens. Recommended if sized up.

They take a day or two to break in and get really soft and comfortable. I wore mine around the house without the insole for a day, then put it back in. They were ready for normal use after that. They're not quite as warm as I hoped they would be, but I'm still extremely happy with the purchase.
Son buenas para el frío,

I don't know the brand, but dang. They look super good. They're quite comfy, too. I've been wearing them for the last few weeks, and I'll probably keep them as my daily drivers. Great fit. Would recommend.

These shoes a very comfortable and warm.  They fit true to size compared to others I have.  It is a nice casual look that goes well with jeans or sweats.  I wouldn't use them for hiking but for everyday wear, they are great.

评论概述: So far, so good. My first "barefoot" shoes
评论详情: I've wanted to try barefoot shoes for a while but was never sure if they'd be for me. I saw these and couldn't pass them up. They are comfortable - VERY comfortable. I never realized how smashed-together my toes are in regular shoes. These feel much more natural. That said, the soles on barefoot shoes, these included, tend to be very thin, and you feel every little bump and pebble and imperfection. Just something worth knowing if you give these a try.

The boots are great, comfortable and warm. If you take out the insole they become truly barefoot, but they get colder. So that’s a trade-off you have to decide about. They are barefoot shoes, so they are totally flat. The insole was also flat, but it took away ground feel and squished the feet in on the edges.  I bought one size bigger than I usually buy because I am going to wear thick socks. And it was a good thing, my usual size wouldn’t have fit thick socks.  I am a woman buying men’s shoes because all of Whitin’s women’s boots options were unappealing. I just wanted a good, winter-friendly, tie-up boot with zero drop. So men’s styles it is. I wouldn’t wear them anywhere as a dress shoe, but they are good everyday boots.  *update* I did something crazy and cut the raised edges off the insole and put it back in my shoe. They feel like barefoot shoes now and are perfectly warm from the bottom. The top lets in cold, though. Wear thick socks. They are waterproof if you are just walking around like a normal person. I haven’t tested them against puddle jumping.

评论概述: Good and warm just not a fan of the toes...
评论详情: Picked these up because I don't really have good winter shoes. I have winter boots, but those are too big and bulky. Wanted something a little nicer looking and these are kind of that. First off, they are pretty well made. Don't think they are high quality, but more than good enough. I like the colors as well.  I wear a size 10, ordered a size 10 and they fit as they should. Well, these are wide and I don't need wide, but they fit good enough for me. It is not super cold here yet, but it is chilly and these are warm, all except for the sole, which is kind of expected. I do like the fleece like lining, it's cozy. Not a fan of laces, but I did not need to loosen the laces too much to get these on.  Only criticism, and this is just my opinion, I am not a fan of how the top of the toes area looks. It does not look bad, just looks sort of weird. Part of that might be because these are wide. Just wish they did something a little different. Kind of like clown shoes?  Overall, they are good shoes, price is just okay, would recommend.

What I liked:  • soft interior - perfect for bare feet or those that prefer socks. Also very warm insulation for the upcoming cold months.  • supportive high top  • room for toes  • general comfort during wear - feels like a slipper/boot with a sleek appearance.

评论概述: Super-Comfortable High-Top Sneakers ... perfect for BATUU*!
评论详情: These shoes are remarkably comfortable, with or without socks.  (Although it's hard to resist the luxurious sensation of their lambswool lining against bare feet.)  I generally wear mine with the laces loose and untied, just knotted inside each of the top eyelets.  This facilitates fast on-and -off, just like the shearling slippers they resemble.  The shoes are relatively light, but—especially with my laces so loose—do not provide a lot of ankle support.  As advertised, the toe box is wide, giving the whole front end of each foot lots of freedom to move, and extra air flow.* Specifically to any Disneyland / Star Wars fans:  I often Disney-bound, especially for Galaxy's Edge.  The puffy ribbing encircling these shoes' collars blends well with Black Spire Outpost fashion; and they are much more comfortable than high boots.

My foot size is between 10.5-11 so I usually get a size 11. I also have a little wide feet. What I like: +Comfy and lightweight +Warm +Stylish +True fit with wide toe box  FYI: They are flat footed and feel more like a moccasin.

评论概述: Minimalist, zero drop, barefoot, Lightweight and Comfortable
评论详情: Lightweight, comfortable, stylish and warm. Also truly minimalist, barefoot and zero drop shoes. I have flat feet and these works well.
